author: ekirby
title: Luvvies such as Ewan McGregor rail against Donald Trump but say nothing about the Sharia beating of Muslim woman
text:
Opinion Kelvin mackenzie Luvvies such as Ewan McGregor rail against Donald Trump but say nothing about the Sharia beating of Muslim woman 
It seems the Bafta mob are too busy parading their moral majesty to the TV millions about Trump to fight for women's rights in Aceh, a semi-autonomous region of Indonesia Comment by Kelvin mackenzie, Sun columnist 12th February 2017, 11:36 pm
